name: Magic Die
description:
Magic Die is a game created for the GMTK Game Jam 2022, where you move a die trying to make the number at the top coincide with the number at the goal.

We have designed some levels with new mechanics to try to make the game more fun!

Music by Jorge Parra García and Patreon Goal Reward 08 - Abstraction

http://www.abstractionmusic.com/
